抬.definition: to lift; to raise; (of two or more persons) to carry

抬槓.definition: to bicker; to argue for the sake of arguing; to carry on poles (together with sb else); to carry a coffin on poles

抬秤.definition: large steelyard usu. operated by three people – two to lift it using a pole, and one to adjust the counterweight

抬舉.definition: to lift sth up; to elevate sb; to honor sb (with compliments, gifts, promotions etc); to show great regard; to speak highly; Taiwan pr. [tai2 ju3]

抬轎子.definition: to carry sb in a sedan chair; flatter; sing praises

抬頭.definition: to raise one's head; to gain ground; account name, or space for writing the name on checks, bills etc

抬頭不見低頭見.pinyin: tai2 tou2 bu4 jian4 di1 tou2 jian4
抬頭不見低頭見.definition: (idiom) (of people in a small town etc) to cross paths regularly

抬顯.definition: head-up display (HUD) (abbr. for 抬頭顯示|抬头显示[tai2tou2 xian3shi4])
